703859f-a.text:
Court Street, at Centre Street, showing the site of
a W. P. A. sewer project.
September 24, 1935
Works Progress Administration
Five Boroughs Project
703859f-a.folder: Court Street & Centre Street, Brooklyn, NY

703857f-c.text:
1-Court Street, east side, at Garnet Street, looking north across the latter from near Hemilton Avenue. A clearance is shown at the N. W. corner of Court and Garnet Streets. Across the row of tenements are the Devoe and Reynolds Company warehouses, on Huntington Street.
April 9, 1939
P. L. Sperr
2,3-North on Court Street from Hamilton Avenue, showing cleared areas and demolition of tenements for the construction of the northerly extension of the Belt Parkway.
October 17, 1940
P. L. Sperr
